long_description: Worn under your hiking socks, our REI Merino Wool liner socks help reduce friction and prevent blisters when you're logging lots of miles on the trail. Super-soft merino wool provides itch-free comfort and moves moisture away naturally; fabric blend is designed to dry quickly. Knit heel and toe areas are shaped for a comfortable fit. REI Merino Wool liner socks feature seamless toes that won't rub or cause chafing. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Worn under your hiking socks, our REI Merino Wool liner socks help reduce friction and prevent blisters when you're logging lots of miles on the trail.
